description: Checks whether a target clause exists in a document and returns evidence with confidence scores.

fields.name: targetClause
fields.description: The clause we are looking for (provided by the caller)

fields.name: clausePresent
fields.description: True if the document contains the clause or a clear paraphrase; otherwise false

fields.name: matchType
fields.description: Return one of: Exact, Semantic, Paraphrase, or Missing

fields.name: evidenceQuote
fields.description: A short quote from the document that supports the decision

fields.name: confidence
fields.description: Confidence score for the match (0.0 to 1.0)

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source location in the document (page number or section)
